resources.string: Knit on the right side, Purl on the wrong side
Purl on the right side, Knit on the wrong side
a right-leaning decrease on the knit side
a right-leaning decrease on the purl side
Slip 2 stitches together knitwise, knit 1, pass 2 slipped stitches over(centre double decrease)
slip 2 stitches knitwise, return these 2 stitches to left needle and then slip them as if to p2tog through back loops, purl 1, pass 2 slipped stitches over purl stitch; centered double decrease
